thread.title: Adele hinting at new song

title: Adele hinting at new song
text:
Adele hinting at new song? 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Monday 19th October, 2015 
Adele seems to have dropped a new song hint for her fans. 
Fans watching commercials during 'The X Factor' U.K. on October 18 were left surprised when a 30-second ad appeared on their small screens that sounded like a special tease of the 27-year-old songstress' newest song, reports E! Online. 
In a matter of seconds, the British singer was heard delivering a soulful delivery of an unnamed track and to twist things up, the only image seen on the black screen was a few lyrics as viewers listened to a piano and voice resembling the Grammy winner. 
Adele's representatives have not commented on the issue yet. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News       Jolie believes you can love the same person you want to kill Entertainment Industry News.Net
